extendedInfo.description: - Top medical app with over 1,500,000 downloads ! - Featured in Discover Magazine as 'Dr House for Doctors' - Winner of the prize for the Best Health App at the World Summit Awards for Mobile Apps, 2012 - Selected as "One of the five best apps for Doctors" by the Royal College of Surgeons of England (RCSE) Want to get the gist of a clinical case study in 2-3 minutes? Try Prognosis : Your Diagnosis - The first and only free Android game that lets you investigate, deduce and diagnose complex clinical cases within minutes with our fun, interactive cartoon-style narrative.Prognosis is specially designed for Doctors, Medical students and Nurses and each case helps to learn or recall two or three key clinical points that can be applied in your practice.The cases also provide excellent preparation for the USMLE Step 2 CS, COMLEX, NCLEX, CCRN and MCAT exams, as well as other board examinations and professional licensure tests. You can use it while waiting for coffee or on the bus, quickly complete a case, learn something new and make the maximum use of your time.The content is modeled on real life patients, has been checked by a panel of expert medical specialists and is based on current management guidelines.A new case is added each week. The app will let you know as new cases are added.If you have comments, criticisms or ideas for new cases, please contact us at support@medicaljoyworks.com - we'd love to hear from you.--------------------------Note on permissions:--------------------------- We use Google Cloud Messaging (GCM) to send you a notification each week, when a new case is released.- GCM requires the following permissions:  "FIND ACCOUNTS ON THE DEVICE", "FULL NETWORK ACCESS", "RECEIVE DATA FROM INTERNET", and "PREVENT PHONE FROM SLEEPING".

reviews.title: Quite good
reviews.comment: As a medical student, this app has been quite helpful. Any effective tool for learning is highly appreciated, great job.
reviews.author: Ugochukwu Iroha

reviews.title: Aydin
reviews.comment: Thanks for developing and updating this amazing app!The best medical app in the market ... very good cases, great layout and my favorite is the discussion part which is succinct and to the point!
reviews.author: Aydin Pourmoslemi

reviews.title: Get this app
reviews.comment: Great app! Succinct and relevant,  great for revision and handy take home messages
reviews.author: Lily Du

reviews.title: Best case app
reviews.comment: Fun, accurate, and a good way to learn!
reviews.author: Ben Murphy

reviews.title: Educating yet Entertaining
reviews.comment: A fantastic  application for future doctor and specialist doctor to use. great cases, great discussion.
reviews.author: Jessica Nadia

reviews.title: I enjoy the app greatly!
reviews.comment: I am not in the medical field or am i studying to, but i really enjoy this app being a parent.  I have recommended it to many medical field friends and relatives...!
reviews.author: tom bealhen

reviews.title: LG Spirit
reviews.comment: im having so much fun with this. and learning so much too. irs a well behaved app that delivers what it promises. who would a thunk flash cards for doctors lol.
reviews.author: Elizabeth Chrissian

reviews.title: Great for quick studying
reviews.comment: Fun cases, and great discussions at the end with sources cited. Kudos for a great medicine app!
reviews.author: John Baird

reviews.title: Full of knowledge..
reviews.comment: Very useful 4 all medico\'s....request to develop softwares according to various systems of body..keep it up..:-)
reviews.author: Amit Rathi

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: I am 14 and I want to be a neurosurgeon when I grow up. This app is very useful and I love all the medical terminology within the game. I have  been getting satisfactory. Can\'t wait to actually learn this stuff. (:
reviews.author: Kristen Osunkwo

reviews.title: Excellent help for multideceplinary work
reviews.comment: As a psy traini I nust use it in my free times to get busy for example while waiting for transport. However, it has gi en me lot of knowlexge a.d helps me to undresta.d the iszues my other colleagues face. Wish it was a facebook application also with some newropsy cases as well.
reviews.author: Sabour Mansouri

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Love it. I am not an MD but I find this game very addictive and educational. With every case I gain so much knowlege. This game alone worth more than thousands of other games on android market. Big thanks to the developer.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: one of d best app
reviews.comment: its great but add more cases... you guys r amazing just develope more apps like based on diagnosis algorithm.
reviews.author: anshul jaiswal

reviews.comment: It is very usefull app for all doctors in the view of interns,post inters,post graduats and also for asst. Professors\tUsers of this app move towards good prognosis in their field....
reviews.author: vara prasad

reviews.title: Broken results
reviews.comment: The investigate and manage sections are broken. You can try different variations of tests and results and the details will always change. Please fix
reviews.author: Alex Ayzenshteyn

reviews.title: Best app ever!!!!
reviews.comment: This is definitely the best app ever. I love being challenged as a nurse and this app cuts the cake.
reviews.author: Teresa Williams

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: This is such an awesome app. Very informative and very helpful. It\'s a great tool for those studying for usmle step 2 and 3 boards.
reviews.author: Alexandria Stuart

reviews.title: Prognosis
reviews.comment: Very good training and reminders. I like using the \'try again\' to nail things down.
reviews.author: Kevyn Smith

reviews.title: Nice mind tingling app
reviews.comment: I am an anesthetist, i am not a treating physician , but frankly i found this app useful...kind of triggers my mind back to clinical thinking and diagnosis plus treatment...wish to see a specific app for anesthetic management of certain cases. Really good work guys...thank you.
reviews.author: mohammad mehyar
